title: Fuck League Of Legends
body: Its sad that after 2 years of being part of this game I've never been more angry than I am at this game and its community. This is why this game is losing players because you ban decent players and let the trolls and retards have their way its totally unfair that you ban me when I've been pretty damn loyal to you fucks. Fighting games are better and always will be. Games like league of legends will not last for more than one more year at best. Why you think nobody watches your shitty ass tournaments? Cause this game is trash. Nobody will ever support this game entirely. They would rather watch mortal kombat and street fighter tournaments. Evo makes more money that entire event than League does in 3 months. Fighting games have better pool and a better more controlled community. With that said I'm glad I'm banned. Cause this community is very uncontrolled and doesn't let real players have their day. I'm gonna personally make sure this game never succeeds I will constantly tell people not to play it because its trash.

yea League is a shitty game. I feel ya. Toxic community, too much unbalance, over priced everything.

I can respect your opinion about the banning and how it can be a stupid game, and how fighting games are better (I play more melee than league). However, I really enjoy league, and its community. I mean, trollers and AFK'ers are a pain, but they really only come once in every 10 games for me. If you got banned, it was probably from something you said in chat, not in game. Rito can't really ban someone for feeding or being bad at the game, but they will ban people for trash talking (which is a shame). Also, League events (at least the largest ones) receive much more income and viewership than Evo. And also consider that Evo is multiple games over multiple days, so it by nature should make more money than a single game on a single day. And lastly, League has a huge loyal community that probably wont die out for another good 10 years.
If this is how you speak, I see why you got banned

200k People watching a league tournament = Nobody. 

You're just salty because you were toxic and got banned or whatever.
League has been around for over ten years. I've seen stadiums filled with more people to watch LCS then I ever have for any sporting event Football included. You're angry and you're wrong. Sucks.

What's the point of this post ?

> Cause this community is very uncontrolled and doesn't let real players have their day.

Been trying to figure this sentence out here.  It seems a tad entitled but that is sort of reasonable (its a video game so by definition it should be giving you positive experiences) however I can't seem to figure out why you think its riots fault.

Online communities in games especially mobas are very bad. Thats just a fact.  But riot has tried to make it better but ultimately the troll has to troll at least once before they get banned.

The funniest part about this comment is the whole "real players" thing.  wtf is a real player? Aren't we all real players?  I can assume you mean competitive and serious about the game (I hope this was aimed at ranked and only ranked) but still if people are having fun and doing their best then they can hardly be blamed for not "letting you have your day".
